scripts.copyfiles: mkdir ./dist/serverapp && cp ./dist/src/serverapp/index.js ./dist/serverapp/index.js && cp ./dist/src/serverapp/index.js.map ./dist/serverapp/index.js.map && cp ./src/serverapp/config.json ./dist/serverapp/config.json && cp ./dist/public/static/webapp/js/index.js ./public/static/webapp/js/index.js && cp ./dist/public/static/webapp/js/index.js.map ./public/static/webapp/js/index.js.map
